CustomField.formula: NOT(AND(OR(TEXT( Status__c) = 'In Progress' , TEXT( Status__c) = 'Change Requested' ) , $Profile.Name = 'System Administrator'))
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Controls the display of the Submit for Approval Button. If the Organization Status is 'In Progress' or 'Change Requested' and User Type is 'Standard' display the Submit for Approval Button
CustomField.label: X_Display Submit For Approval Button
